interesting_facts: India is the world's largest democracy.
It is home to the ancient Indus Valley Civilization.

The game of chess originated in India.
India has the second-largest English-speaking population in the world.
The U.S. is the third most populous country in the world.
It is home to the world's largest economy.
The U.S. has no official language at the federal level.

The U.S. has the highest number of Nobel Prize winners.
China has the world's largest population.

China invented paper, gunpowder, and printing.
It has the world's oldest continuous civilization.
Chinese is the most spoken language in the world.
Brazil is the largest country in South America.

The Amazon Rainforest, the world's largest, is in Brazil.
Brazil has won the FIFA World Cup a record five times.
Carnival in Rio de Janeiro is the world's largest festival.
Australia is the only country that is also a continent.
It has more kangaroos than people.
Australia is home to the world's largest coral reef, the Great Barrier Reef.
It is the flattest and driest inhabited continent.
Australia has the world's oldest living cultures, the Aboriginal people.

Russia is the largest country in the world by land area.
